Content.Name: Large Side Floating Quotes
Content.Title: Large Side Floating Quotes
Content.BodyCopy:
Below is a working example of this template.
You'll find simple instructions of how to use and customize it beneath it.


You can customize:
  • Text
You cannot customize:
  • Layout
  • Spacing between quotes and other text

Instructions:

  1. Copy the code below.
  2. Find page in Ingeniux you want to use this template on.
  3. Click 'HTML'.
  4. Paste the code you copied in step 1.
  5. Click 'Update'.
  6. Customize text.
        <style>
            #container710{
                float:left;
                overflow:hidden;
                text-align: justify;
            }
            .lW { float: left; clear: left; height: 1em; text-align:left; }
            .rW { float: right; clear: right; height: 1em; text-align:right;}
            #container710 img{
                margin:10px;
            }
            .blockquotewrapper{
                width:370px;
                height:auto;
                margin:15px;
                margin-bottom:5px;
                padding-right:0px;
                -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #000000;
                -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #000000;
                box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #000000;
                border:1px solid #777777;
            }
            .blockquotebox{
                padding:20px;
                font-size:200%;
                line-height:30px;
                text-align: center;
            }
        </style>
        <div id="container710" class="span-18">
            <div class="rW" style="width:400px;height:auto;">
                <div class="blockquotewrapper">
                    <div class="blockquotebox">
                        "Insert block quote or other text here.  Insert block quote or other text here.  Insert block quote or other text here.  Insert block quote or other text here.  Insert block quote or other text here.  "
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="lW" style="width:0px;"></div>
